post:
[**ResellWays**](https://www.resellways.com/) is a Purple IT Ltd company. We have 10 years experience in Web Hosting business. Recently we started our Budget brand ResellWays. We are offering [**SSD Hosting**](https://www.resellways.com/ssd-hosting.html) and [**Reseller Hosting**](https://www.resellways.com/reseller-hosting.html) from ResellWays.


**All SSD Hosting plans include**

   - 24/7/365 Support Ticket support (Mail/Helpdesk)
   - cPanel Control Panel with Softaculous
   - Cloudlinux OS For Noisy Neighbours
   - AutoSSL (LetsEncrypt/COMODO)
   - At least Quad Core Servers with RAID 10 SSD
   - Latest PHP 5.3 -7.2
   - 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
   - 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
   - Daily Backups
   - Online Webmail and FTP (includes Roundcube, Horde, SquirrelMail)
   - CURL, ImageMagick, GD, PHP 5, MariaDB 10.2, CGI, IonCube, Zend Optimizer and more!

<br />
**Plan Details:**

**Personal**

   - 5 GB Disk space
   - 100 GB Data Transfer
   - 0 Addon Domain
   - 10 Sub-domains
   - 10 Database
   - Unlimited Email/FTP Accounts

**First Year: $8.99/yr
Recurring: $11.99/yr**

[**Order Now**](https://clients.resellways.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1&promocode=Love4ResellWays) | [**View Details**](https://www.resellways.com/ssd-hosting.html)

<br />

**Standard**

 - 15 GB Disk space
 - 500 GB Data Transfer
 - 3 Addon Domain
 - 20 Sub-domains
 - 20 Database
 - Unlimited Email/FTP Accounts

**First Year: $26.99/yr
Recurring: $35.99/yr**

[**Order Now**](https://clients.resellways.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2&promocode=Love4ResellWays) | [**View Details**](https://www.resellways.com/ssd-hosting.html)

<br />

**Professional**

   - 30 GB Disk space
   - 1000 GB Data Transfer
   - Unlimited Addon Domain
   - Unlimited Sub-domains
   - Unlimited Database
   - Unlimited Email/FTP Accounts

**First Year: $44.99/yr
Recurring: $59.99/yr**

[**Order Now**](https://clients.resellways.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=3&promocode=Love4ResellWays) | [**View Details**](https://www.resellways.com/ssd-hosting.html)
